1534612263_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnX.body: I keep getting those on my own ZeroBlog!!!! Upgraded to ZeroNet py3... The problem is still there. Interesting enough, the problem is not present on new posts. Only on comments on old posts. I can't get my head around this one...

> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_11_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): @insurgo: you can mention your blog address or try to check, modify the limit in content.json files of your site (i think this file will be somewhere in zeronet/data/yoursiteaddress/data/ sub folders). You can also search for "content too large" on ZeroHello, to find numerous tips on what to do.

Was fixed with https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroBlog/issues/75
